preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 21.0 g of Aluminum (Ac). 
 2. Weigh out 3.0 g of Gadolinium (Gd). 
 3. Weigh out 84.0 g of Selenium (Se). 
 4. In a clean, dry container, combine the three metals thoroughly using a spatula or mixing tool, ensuring an even distribution.
